definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Lines of simple white headstones mark the graves.
sentences.chinese: 一排排简单的白色墓石标明了墓地的位置。

sentences.english: Lines of simple white headstones mark the graves .
sentences.chinese: 成行排列的简朴的白色墓石竖立在墓前。

sentences.english: Lines of simple white headstones mark the graves.
sentences.chinese: 一排一排的白色墓石勾勒出这座公墓。

sentences.english: Such stability was a clear gravestone marking a lifeless planet.
sentences.chinese: 这种稳定性就是制造毫无生命的星球的墓石。

definition: inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
the top part of a tablet
pedestal in the form of a tortoise
